power.title: Arrow of Warning
power.fluff: Your shot hinders an enemy and gives its would-be target the perfect opportunity

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within range makes an attack roll against an ally

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage.
The triggering ally gains a bonus to the attack roll it makes as part of this power's effect. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: After the triggering attack has been resolved, the triggering ally can make an at-will attack against the enemy as a free reaction.

power.title: Burdening Dirge
power.fluff: Your dire lament is a heavy weight on your foe's mind, binding that enemy when your allies cause it pain

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target, the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Cautionary Tale
power.fluff: Your warning inspires your allies to be be vigilant against danger from all sides, and thanks to their caution, one of them can find a moment to strike with greater effect

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 5 (Arcane) until the end of the encounter.
Allies in the aura do not grant combat advantage due to being flanked.
Once before the end of the encounter, You can use the following action:

section.name: Opportunity Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An ally in the aura hits with an attack; The triggering attack deals +2d10 extra damage.

power.title: Dirge of the Damned
power.fluff: You begin chanting a dirge that makes every strike from your allies cut just that much deeper into your doomed enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 5 (Arcane) until the end of the encounter.
Allies in the aura gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls. This increases to a +4 power bonus against bloodied enemies.

power.title: Disruptive Words
power.fluff: You call out to your enemies with words that distract and confuse them, drawing their attention away at a critical moment and opening them up to your allies' attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 5 (Arcane) until the end of the encounter.
Enemies in the aura grant combat advantage.
Once before the end of the encounter, when an enemy in the aura takes damage from any source, you can use a free interrupt to make that enemy dazed (save ends).

power.title: Echoes of the Guardian
power.fluff: You recite a verse from the sage of a great warrior, confounding your enemy so that one of your companions can more easily protect the others

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target is marked by an ally within 5 squares of you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, once on each of your turns when you hit an enemy, choose an ally within 5 squares of you. The enemy you hit is marked by that ally.

power.title: Echoing Roar
power.fluff: Your resounding song hammers your foe, dogging its steps and making escape impossible

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is affected by an echoing roar (save ends).
While affected by the roar, the target takes ongoing 5 thunder damage and cannot become hidden or benefit from concealment or cover (but can benefit from total concealment or superior cover).

power.title: Malevolent Mischief
power.fluff: You plague your foe with a spell of ill luck, causing knots to unravel and straps to part it stumbles like an oaf

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before resolving the attack, the target is affected by ill luck (save ends).

While affected by ill luck, whenever you or an ally hit the target, it is slowed until the start of the acting creature's next turn. If you or an ally scores a critical hit on the target, it is slowed until the end of the acting creature's next turn instead.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Saga of Rivalry
power.fluff: You recite a tale of hatred and challenge, inciting one of your allies to fight a foe to the end

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst and one enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target enemy until the end of the encounter.
If the target ally is marked by the target enemy, he or she also gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls against it.
The target enemy is incited to a duel (save ends).

While incited, the target enemy takes 5 damage at the end of its turn if it is not adjacent to the target ally. The target enemy takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this effect if it is marked by the target ally or marking the target ally.

power.title: Satire of Fortune
power.fluff: You mock your foe's luck, using your verse to make your insults come painfully true

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, once between each of your turns, when an ally misses the target with an attack, you can use an opportunity interrupt to roll a d20 and replace the ally's roll with yours.

power.title: Slayer's Song
power.fluff: You sing a tune of war that diminishes your foes' defenses with each blow you strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit an enemy with a bard attack, that enemy grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your following turn.
The first time you hit an enemy with a bard attack before the end of the encounter, you deal +2d6 additional damage.

power.title: Sprightly Rhythm
power.fluff: With precision timing, you tap out a beat that forces enemies away and allows allies to reorient themselves

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each ally in the burst can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

power.title: Stirring Shout
power.fluff: Your shout of wrath stabs into your foe's mind, and each time your allies hit that foe, they draw strength from its weakness

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an ally hits the target, that ally regains hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Verse of Triumph
power.fluff: Your voice crescendos as you sing of victory, with your inspirational words driving allies forward to attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 5 (Arcane) until the end of the encounter.
You and allies in the aura gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.
Whenever you or an ally in the aura reduces an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer, you and each ally in the aura can shift 1 square as a free reaction.
